channel.title: CloudBounce AI auto-mastering: New Mac/Win desktop app
channel.description:
Feeling particularly glad that I just renewed my CloudBounce Infinity (unlimited) account while the hugely discounted* deal was on…
The new desktop app is free to all Infinity accounts:
* faster uploads, mastering, export process [just test, hella faster] * batch mastering * reference track upload * LUFS/Loudness control * export to more formats incl. WAV, AIFF, FLAC, Ogg-Vorbis, CoreAudio, MP3 (with customisable quality settings) * export to multiple formats in one go
  Note: The official price has gone back up to $19.99/month, if you go via the app.cloudbounce.com site. But it seems **[the $59/y offer page is still live on the regular site](https://cloudbounce.com/campaigns/stay-home-deal)**. So, definitely the cheapest way to get unlimited auto-mastering with access to the new desktop app, new features, etc…)
  https://app.cloudbounce.com/
 
https://cloudbounce.com/campaigns/stay-home-deal
 
https://cloudbounce-static.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/videos/what-is.mp4

item.title: CloudBounce AI auto-mastering: New Mac/Win desktop app
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
Feeling particularly glad that I just renewed my CloudBounce Infinity (unlimited) account while the hugely discounted* deal was on…

The new desktop app is free to all Infinity accounts:

  • faster uploads, mastering, export process [just test, hella faster]
  • batch mastering
  • reference track upload
  • LUFS/Loudness control
  • export to more formats incl. WAV, AIFF, FLAC, Ogg-Vorbis, CoreAudio, MP3 (with customisable quality settings)
  • export to multiple formats in one go

 
Note: The official price has gone back up to $19.99/month, if you go via the app.cloudbounce.com site.
But it seems the $59/y offer page is still live on the regular site. So, definitely the cheapest way to get unlimited auto-mastering with access to the new desktop app, new features, etc…)

 

app.cloudbounce.com

CloudBounce

Lightning fast MUSIC MASTERING on your desktop

 

cloudbounce.com

Stay at home and Music on. Unlimited Audio Mastering for a Year. Save up to 76%.

It’s now tough out there in the real World. New and unexpected things have caught us off guard. The healthy and strong will do their best to remain that way. If you love music like us, you already know how powerful music can be. We want to help you...

 

Read full topic
